channel.title: Pages on Yui's personal task manager
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Yui's personal task manager

item.title: Download and Install
item.description: Install Yui-CLI (command line) Install from python repository (see also pypi.org/project/yui/) pip install yui That’s it :) Install Yui-GUI alpha Download installer for windows 10: Yui-1.0.1-alpha-win10-x64-installer-signed.exe (upd:2023-03-07) RPM for Fedora/CentOS/RedHat: coming soon DEB for Ubuntu/Debian: coming soon Please, submit any bugs found here: github.com/AgaveStorm/yui/issues Changelog [2023-02-20] Added Dark/Light theme support
